events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development positions.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your application case to guide you through next steps.
Your initial screening interview was successfully completed and the feedback was very positive regarding your software engineering skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirmation of availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate your software development expertise.
You have completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 10th to discuss company culture, benefits, and next hiring steps.
Your HR interview was completed and feedback indicates a great fit with the company values and team environment.
We are pleased to propose a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
You have responded positively to the offer and provided feedback expressing enthusiasm for joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the job offer! We are excited to welcome you as part of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started, including access setup and introduction sessions planned for your first week.
The hiring process is now closed and you are successfully onboarded as a new software engineer in our company.
